description: Performance and health metrics for Prometheus MSSQL Exporter running on docker.

targets.query: SELECT mean("total") FROM "State OFFLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Number of lock requests per second that resulted in a deadlock since last restart

targets.query: SELECT "total" FROM "State ONLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Deadlocks

panels.description: Number of kill connection errors/sec since last restart

targets.query: SELECT "total" FROM "State OFFLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Kill Connection Errors

panels.description: Wait time (s) of stall since last restart

reduceOptions.fields: /^\{app_kubernetes_io_instance="sql\-exporter", app_kubernetes_io_managed_by="Helm", app_kubernetes_io_name="sql\-exporter", app_kubernetes_io_version="0\.13\.0", cluster="production", db="DWDiagnostics", helm_sh_chart="sql\-exporter\-0\.2\.4", instance="10\.42\.5\.32:9399", job="kubernetes\-service\-endpoints", kubernetes_name="sql\-exporter", kubernetes_namespace="stage", target="stage"\}$/

targets.query: SELECT "total" FROM "State SUSPECT" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Total Wait Time

panels.description: Number of Transact-SQL command batches received per second. This statistic is affected by all constraints (such as I/O, number of users, cachesize, complexity of requests, and so on). High batch requests mean good throughput

targets.query: SELECT "total" FROM "State RECOVERING" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Number of Transact-SQL

panels.description: Number of page faults since last restart

targets.query: SELECT "total" FROM "State RECOVERY_PENDING" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Number of page faults

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "Point In Time Recovery" FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance metrics' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model FULL" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model BULK_LOGGED" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model SIMPLE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Number of user errors/sec since last restart
panels.title: User Errors

panels.description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart
panels.title: Write Stall Time (ms)

panels.description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart
panels.title: Read Stall Time (ms)

panels.description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart
panels.title: Write Queue Stall Time (ms)

panels.description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart
panels.title: Read Queue Stall Time (ms)

title: Prometheus MSSQL Exporter
